hadith.text: Jabir b. 'Abdullah (Allah be pleased with them) reported Allah's Messenger (ï·º) as saying:He who has a partner in a dwelling or a garden, it is not lawful for him to sell that until he is permitted by his partner. If he (the partner) agrees, he should go in for that, and if he disapproves of that, he should abandon (the idea of selling it)
